name: Excel CustomTaskPane
tagline: Sample project that creates a WPF based Custom Task Pane in Excel
body:
ExcelCustomTaskPane
===================

Sample project that creates a WPF(XAML) based CustomTaskPane in Excel using F#3.0/VS2012.

### References

1. Docking WPF (XAML) UserControls in Task Pane [http://www.clear-lines.com/blog/post/Docking-WPF-controls-in-the-VSTO-Task-Pane.aspx](http://www.clear-lines.com/blog/post/Docking-WPF-controls-in-the-VSTO-Task-Pane.aspx)
2.  Building a CustomTaskPane with ExcelDna [http://exceldna.codeplex.com/SourceControl/changeset/view/78811#1198220](http://exceldna.codeplex.com/SourceControl/changeset/view/78811#1198220)
3.  FSharpx XAML TypeProvider [http://www.navision-blog.de/2012/03/22/wpf-designer-for-f/](http://www.navision-blog.de/2012/03/22/wpf-designer-for-f/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
